title: Unturned合成表
txt_content:
本帖最后由 52798165 于 2014-7-14 09:05 编辑 

Basic yields
【基础材料】
1 Scrap Metal = 2 Nails
【1废金属】=2【钉子】
1 Scrap Metal + Fire (Tool) = 2 Bolts
【1废金属】+【火】=【2螺栓】
1 Board + Axe (Tool) = 4 Sticks (this dosent seem to be working atm)
【1木板】+【斧子】=【4木棒】
2 Stones + Fire (Tool) = 1 Scrap Metal
【2石头】+【火】=【1废金属】
1 Branch = 3 Sticks
【1树枝】=【3木棒】
1 Rocks = 3 Stones
【1岩石】=【3石头】
Components【零件】2 Boards = 1 Wooden Plate【2木板】=【1木制板】
2 Sticks = 1 Wooden Support【2木棒】=【1木支架】
2 Plates = 1 Wooden Frame【2木制板】=【1木制框架】
2 Wooden Support = 1 Wooden Cross【2木支架】=【1交叉式木质框架】
2 Sticks + Pocket Knife (Tool) = 1 Wooden Spike【2木棒】+【小刀】=【木锥】
2 Stones = 1 Stone Plate【2石头】=【1石板】
2 Stone Plate = 1 Stone Frame【2石板】=【1石制架子】
1 Stones + 1 Boards = 1 Stone Support【1石头】+【1木板】=【1石材支架】
2 Stone Support = 1 Stone Cross【2石材支架】=【1石制交叉框架】







Barricades【盾牌】
3 boards + 1 Nails = ( Wooden Shield )【3木板】+【1钉子】=【木盾】
4 Scrap Metal + 2 Bolts = Metal Shield【4废金属】+【2螺栓】=【金属盾】







Wooden Structures【木质建造物品】
3 Wooden Frames = 1 Foundation【3木制框架】=【1地基】 
2 Wooden Supports + 1 Board = 1 Wooden Pillar【2木支架】+【1木板】=【1木制支柱】
2 Wooden Pillars + 2 Wooden Frames = 1 Wooden Wall【2木制支柱】+【2木制框架】=【1木墙】
1 Wooden Wall = 2 Wooden Ramparts【1木墙】=【2木制防御墙】
1 Wooden Platform + 2 Wooden Supports = 1 Wooden Ramp【1木制防御墙】+【2木支架】=【1木斜坡】
1 Wooden Platform + 1 Wooden Frame = 1 Floor Hole【1木制防御墙】+【1木制框架】=【1楼板孔】
12 Sticks + 1 Duct Tape = 1 Wooden Ladder【12木棒】+【1宽胶带】=【1木梯】
1 Bolts + 1 Wooden Frame = Wooden Door【1螺栓】+【1木制框架】=【1木门】
1 Bolts + 1 Wooden Door = Wooden Shutter【1螺栓】+【1木门】=【1木制百叶窗】
4 Wooden Plates + 1 Wooden Cross = Wooden Platform【4木制板】+【1交叉式木质框架】=【1木平台】
1 Wooden Wall + 1 Wooden Support = 1 Wooden Doorway【1木墙】+【1木支架】=【1木制的门】（不知道干嘛的）
1 Wooden Pillar = 2 Wooden Posts【1木制支柱】=【2木头柱】
1 Wooden Doorway + 1 Wooden Support = 1 Wooden Window【1木制的门】+【1木支架】=【1木窗】
1 Foundation + 2 Rope = Greenhouse Foundation【1地基】+【2绳子】=【温室地基？】
1 Wooden Platform + 2 Rope = Greenhouse Platform【1木平台】+【2Rope】=【温室平台？】









Stone structures (requires level 2 Craftsman skill)【石制建筑物品】（需要工匠2级）
2 Stone Supports + 1 Board = Stone Pillar【2石支架】+【1木板】=【石制支柱】
2 Stone Frames + 2 Stone Pillars = Stone Wall 【2石制框架】+【2石制支柱】=【1石墙】
1 Stone Wall + 1 Stone Support = 1 Stone Doorway 【1石墙】+【1石支架】=【1石制的门】1 Stone Doorway + 1 Stone Support = 1 Stone Window【1石制的门】+【1石支架】=【1石窗】



Placeables【关于出生点】
7 Cloth + 2 Duct Tape = 1 Sleeping Bag【7碎布】+【2宽胶带】=【1睡袋】
5 Scrap Metal + 8 Cloth = 1 Cot【5废金属】+【8碎布】=【1床】
2 Wooden Frame + 3 Wooden Cross = Crate (Requires level 2 Craftsman skill)【2木质框架】+【3木质交叉框架】=【木箱】（需要工匠2级）



Traps【陷阱】
4 Wooden Spikes = 1 Wooden Spike Trap【4木刺】=【1木制钉陷阱】
1 Tin Can + 2 Scrap Metal = 1 Snare【1锡制罐】+【2废金属】=【1诱饵陷阱
】2 Nails = Caltrop【2钉子】=【1棱角】（一种放在地上用以吃着迟滞敌人行动的东西，有棱角用来伤敌，又称铁蒺藜。）自己根据以前看过的资料记的，不知道对不对
2 Wire = Barbed wire【2金属丝】=【1铁丝网】
2 Wire + 3 Scrap Metal = Electric Trap【2金属丝】+【3废金属】=【1导电陷阱】
3 Raw explosives + 2 Duct tape = 1 C4【3炸药】+【2宽胶带】=【1C4】
2 Raw explosives + 4 Wire = 1 Claymore【2炸药】+【2金属丝】=【1阔剑激光感触地雷】
2 Raw explosives + 1 Empty Can = 1 Landmine【2炸药】+【2废弃易拉罐】【1压力感知地雷】



Storage【储藏用物品】
3 wood cross + 3 wooden frame = 1 storage【木制交叉框架】+【3木制框架】=【1储藏箱】



Food【食物】
1 Raw Venison + Fire = 1 Cooked Venison【1鹿肉】+【火】=【1熟鹿肉】
1 Moldy Bottled Water + Fire = 1 Bottled Water【1发霉的瓶装水】+【火】=【1干净的瓶装水】



Farming【种植】
1 Fresh Carrot = 2 Carrot Seeds【1新鲜胡萝卜】=【2胡萝卜种子】
1 Moldy Carrot = 1 Carrot Seed【1发霉的胡萝卜】=【1胡萝卜种子】
1 Fresh Tomato = 2 Tomato Seeds【1新鲜番茄】=【2番茄种子】
1 Moldy Tomato = 1 Tomato Seed【1发霉的番茄】=【1番茄种子】
1 Fresh Corn = 2 Corn Seeds【1新鲜玉米】=【2玉米种子】
1 Moldy Corn = 1 Corn Seed【1发霉的玉米】=【1玉米种子】
1 Fresh Cabbage = 2 Cabbage Seeds【1新鲜的卷心菜】=【2种子卷心菜种子】
1 Moldy Cabbage = 1 Cabbage Seed【1发霉的卷心菜】=【1种子卷心菜种子】
1 Fresh Potato = 2 Potato Seeds【1新鲜土豆】=【2马铃薯种子】1 Moldy Potato = 1 Potato Seed【1土豆种子发霉的土豆】=【1马铃薯种子】



Clothing【服装】
4 Deer Pelts = 1 Deer Shirt【4鹿皮】=【1鹿皮衬衫】
3 Deer Pelts + 1 Rope = 1 Deer Pants【3鹿皮】+【1绳子】=【1鹿皮背包】



Backpack【背包】
3 Animal Pelts + 2 Duct Tape = 1 Deer Backpack【3动物毛皮】+【2宽胶带】=【1皮制背包】



Medical Supplies【医疗物品】
2 Cloth = 1 Rag【2碎布】=【1简易绷带】
1 Scrap + 2 Sticks = 1 Splint【1废料】+【2木棒】=【夹板】（目测治疗骨折）
2 Red Berries + Rocks (Tool)= 1 Crushed Red Berries【2红色浆果】+【岩石】=【1压碎的红色浆果】（估计是可以变成喝的吧）
2 Blue Berries + Rocks (Tool)= 1 Crushed Blue Berries【2蓝色浆果】+【岩石】=【1压碎的蓝色浆果】
2 Pink Berries + Rocks (Tool)= 1 Crushed Pink Berries【2粉色浆果】+【岩石】=【1压碎的粉色浆果】
2 Pale Berries + Rocks (Tool)= 1 Crushed Pale Berries【2白色浆果】+【岩石】=【1压碎的白色浆果】
2 Green Berries + Rocks (Tool)= 1 Crushed Green Berries【2绿色浆果】+【岩石】=【1压碎的绿色浆果】
2 Purple Berries + Rocks (Tool)= 1 Crushed Purple Berries【2紫色浆果】+【岩石】=【1压碎的紫色浆果】

1 Common clothes = 1 cloth【1普通的衣服】=【1碎布】
1 Uncommon clothes = 2 cloth【1罕见的衣服】=【2碎布】



Weapons【武器】
1 Stick + 1 Wooden Support = 1 Tree Branch【1木棒】+【1木支架】=【1分叉的树支架】（大概应该可能是这样）
3 Wooden Support + 2 Rope = 1 Bow【3木支架】+【2绳子】=【1弓】



Light Sources【光照】
4 Sticks + 4 Stones = Campfire【4木棒】+【4石头】=【篝火堆】
1 Batteries + 2 Scrap Metal = Hand Lamp【1电池】+【2废金属】=【1手电】



Ammunition【弹药】
1 Civilan Bullets + (Swift / Bonjour / Lebel / Winchester / Xtrmin) magazine = Full magazine【1民用子弹】+【(Swift / Bonjour / Lebel / Winchester / Xtrmin)这些弹药的弹夹】=满的这些弹药的弹夹2 
Civilian Bullets + (Savage / Yuri) magazine = Full magazine【2民用子弹】+【(Savage / Yuri)这些弹药的弹夹】=满的这些弹药的弹夹4 
Civilian Bullets + Savage drum = Full Savage drum【4民用子弹】+【Savage drum弹药的弹夹】=满的弹药的弹夹
1 Military Bullets + Lapua magazine = Full Lapua magazine【1军用子弹】+【Lapua弹夹】=【满的Lapua弹夹】
1 Tracer Bullets + Lapua tracer magazine = Full Lapua tracer magazine【1曳光弹】+【Lapua tracer弹夹】=【满的Lapua tracer弹夹】
2 Military Bullets + NATO magazine = Full NATO magazine【2军用子弹】+【NATO弹夹】=【满的NATO弹夹】
4 Military Bullets + NATO drum = Full NATO drum【4军用子弹】+【NATO drum弹夹】=【满的NATO drum弹夹】
2 Tracer Bullets + NATO tracer magazine= Full NATO Tracer magazine【2曳光弹】+【NATO tracer弹夹】=【满的NATO tracer弹夹】
1 Stick + 1 Nails = 3 Arrows【1木棒】+【1钉子】=【3箭】
Attachments【配件】2 Canned Colas + 2 Empty Cans + Fire = Muffler 【2罐装可乐】+【2废弃空罐】+【火】=【消声器】（.....）1 Binoculars + 2 Duct Tape = Zoomomatic 【1望远镜】+【2宽胶带】=【1瞄准镜】（没说倍率）1 Hand Lamp (Not Torch) + 2 Duct Tape = Tactical Light【1手电】+【2宽胶带】=【1下挂式手电筒】
本文章来自百度UNTURNED吧喜欢这个游戏的可以加群287051085哦



[groupid=594]火星地带[/groupid]

这样完全没法看

replies.txt_content: 很有用，真好，我是个新手····

replies.txt_content:
shiguang 发表于 2014-7-25 21:35
宽胶带何在？
好吧 我知道了 野外有 像车轮毂一样的东西

replies.author: Worf丶Horo
replies.txt_content:
我再给你补几个
3钉子 + 1炸药 = 手雷弹
1望远镜 + 2个胶带 = 枪用望远镜【配件
2胶带 + 1手电[Handlamp] = 军用手电
2可乐 + 2个罐头[Can] + 火 = 自制消音器

replies.author: 2ol2
replies.txt_content:
纠正下：

毛皮背包需要4个动物毛皮和1个宽胶带

replies.txt_content: 为什么我工匠满级了还不能做箱子？
